description: Recommended third-party skill packs for joelclaw. These skills are NOT bundled in this repo — install them from their canonical sources to preserve attribution.

packs.name: inngest
packs.description: Inngest durable functions, events, flow control, middleware, setup, and step patterns.

packs.name: vercel-react
packs.description: React composition patterns, performance best practices, and web design guidelines from Vercel Engineering.

packs.name: vercel-next
packs.description: Next.js best practices, cache components, and upgrade guides from Vercel.

packs.name: axiom
packs.description: 64+ iOS/SwiftUI/Apple development skills by Charles Wiltgen. HIG, Liquid Glass, SwiftData, SF Symbols, and more.

packs.name: marketing
packs.description: 20+ marketing skills by Corey Haines — copywriting, SEO, CRO, analytics, content strategy.

packs.name: platform-design
packs.description: Apple HIG design guidelines per platform — iOS, iPadOS, macOS, visionOS.

packs.name: graphite
packs.description: Context-efficient Git and Graphite stacked diff workflows.

packs.name: axiom-observability
packs.description: Axiom observability skills — dashboards, APL queries, cost control, SPL-to-APL migration, SRE incident response.

packs.name: skills-meta
packs.description: Skill discovery and management meta-skill from Vercel Labs.
